_metadata.description: F1 Global Coefficients - Year-specific parameters for feature engineering
_metadata.note: Values can be tuned based on model performance

2024.weight_penalty_description: Lap time penalty in seconds per kg of weight (fuel/ballast)
2024.tire_degradation_description: Base degradation rate per lap (multiplied by track-specific rate)
2024.fuel_speed_penalty_description: kph loss per kg of fuel above baseline (10kg)
2024.ers_description: ERS limited to 4MJ deployment per lap (120kJ/s for 33.33s)
2024.aero_description: Baseline aerodynamic efficiency (downforce vs drag ratio)
2024.mechanical_grip_description: Suspension and chassis mechanical grip baseline
2024.consistency_description: How much driver consistency affects lap time variance
2024.track_evolution_description: Lap time improvement per session as track rubbers in
2024.pit_stop_description: Average time loss including pit lane speed limit and stop

2025.weight_penalty_description: Slight improvement due to aero efficiency gains
2025.fuel_speed_penalty_description: Better fuel efficiency reduces speed penalty
2025.drs_description: Improved DRS efficiency from aero development
2025.ers_description: Slight ERS improvements within current regulations
2025.consistency_description: Teams better understand current regs = more consistent
2025.track_evolution_description: Marginal improvement in track evolution modeling

2026.weight_penalty_description: Lighter cars = less sensitive to weight (30kg reduction helps)
2026.tire_degradation_description: Lighter cars = less tire stress = better degradation
2026.active_aero_description: X-mode (low drag) vs Z-mode (high downforce) replaces DRS
2026.ers_description: MASSIVE CHANGE: MGU-K power tripled! 350kJ vs 120kJ (no MGU-H)
2026.override_boost_description: Drivers can temporarily exceed power limits (similar to push-to-pass)
2026.power_clipping_description: Electric dependency = more clipping at high speeds (290 vs 315 kph)
2026.aero_description: Major aero redesign = 20% better L/D ratio
2026.mechanical_grip_description: Lighter, smaller cars = better mechanical grip
2026.consistency_description: New regs = higher variance initially, consistency more valuable
2026.deployment_error_description: Wrong aero mode (X when need Z) costs time in corners
2026.track_evolution_description: Different tire compounds affect track evolution
2026.pit_stop_description: Lighter cars = faster pit lane speeds (80kph limit unchanged)
2026.adaptability_description: First 5 races have higher variance as teams learn new regs

feature_engineering_constants.tire_age_description: Lose 0.05% per lap, capped at 8% total degradation
feature_engineering_constants.fuel_baseline_description: Baseline fuel load for qualifying (minimal fuel)
feature_engineering_constants.speed_description: Convert kph to m/s by dividing by 3.6
feature_engineering_constants.g_force_description: Above 2G lateral = cornering (for deployment error detection)
feature_engineering_constants.throttle_description: Above 95% throttle = full throttle (for clipping detection)
feature_engineering_constants.consistency_description: Multiply lap time CV% by 5 for sandbagging score
feature_engineering_constants.position_ranking_description: Predict continuous values then rank (vs classify directly)

model_hyperparameters_suggestions.note: These are starting points - use GridSearchCV or Optuna to optimize

target_performance_metrics.top_3_description: 70% of top 3 predictions should be correct drivers (order may vary)
